page.title: 07LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The nearest police station is at North wich- about 3 miles away. Weaverham used to have its own small police station with a policeman living there but it was closed a few years ago and the house was sold. Now we just have one policeman who is responsible for this village. He tries to get to know the people in the village so that they can go to him for help and advice and he is always on the lookout for any trouble. Unfortunately he is only on duty for about 1/4 of the week. At other times policemen from Northwich drive or walk through the village at certain times. The local policeman likes the village very much. He does not have very much serious crime to deal with- burglary mainly by criminals from nearby cities, some vandalism by youths and break-ins at one of the four village schools.
